Ingredients

- 400g basmati rice
- 300g pineapple
- 150g cashew
- 2 carrots
- 1 red pepper
- 200g sugarsnap peas
- 400ml cocomilk
- curry powder
- curcuma (turmeric)
- chilipowder
- onion
